titles.title: Of inquiry directing the Secretary of Homeland Security to provide certain information relating to enforcement and removal operations.
Of inquiry directing the Secretary of Homeland Security to provide certain information relating to enforcement and removal operations.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Citizenship.

bill.summary:
This resolution directs the Department of Homeland Security (DHS), to the extent that such information is in the possession of DHS, to transmit to the House of Representatives copies of documents, emails, charts, or tables, no later than 14 days after date on which this resolution is agreed to, for FY2021, which refer or relate to
information on custody and case management, including Enforcement and Removal Operations of the U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement nondetained cases; information on administrative and criminal arrests; information on U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement detainers; and information on removals.
